A. Prepare a standard curve of known concentrations of FMN


1.     Dissolve FMN in NaCl 0.9% at a concentration of 6.25mg/ml


2.      Mix thoroughly by vortex


3.      Prepare a serial dilution in 0.9% sodium chloride to

Obtain FMN solutions ranging from 9.8ng/ml to 625ng/ml


a.      62.5µg/ml: Ad 10µl stock to 990µl NaCl 0.9%;

Mix thoroughly by vortex

b.      625ng/ml: Ad 100µl a. to 9900µl NaCl 0.9%;

Mix thoroughly by vortex

d.      156.3ng/ml: 1000µl c. to 1000µl NaCl 0.9%;

Plate well in eightfold


5.      Load 100µl 0.9% NaCl into a black nonbinding 96-well micro

the standard deviation of each FMN solution and the blank

c.      Calculate the %CV ((standard deviation/mean)*100) of each FMN solution and the blank; this must be less than 10% (usually less than 2%)

d.      Subtract the mean of the blank from the mean of the different FMN solutions

e.      Prepare a linear standard curve using the data produced from the diluted FMN solutions.

Put ‘mean fluorescence’ – ‘mean blank’ on the Y-axis (linear) and concentration (ng/ml) on the X-axis (linear)

 

B. Measure fluorescence in perfusate samples


1.      Preparation of perfusate samples


a.      Collect samples at different time points during the experiment in EDTA tubes

b.      Centrifuge at 3500rpm at 4°C for 10 minutes within 20 minutes after collection

c.      Pipet the supernatant in a tube and immediately

Freeze in liquid nitrogen

d.      Store at -80°C until use


2.      Preparation of positive control samples


a.      As controls,
Pool samples with expected low and high amounts of FMN together.

These samples should ideally be from the same set of experiments or at least from experiments with the same perfusate composition, so they have the same matrix

b.      Store aliquots at -80°C


3.      Measure FMN concentration in unknown perfusate samples


a.      Load 100µl of perfusate sample into a black nonbinding 96-well micro
100µl of NaCl 0.9% into the same black nonbinding 96-well micro

Plate in eightfold as blank

c.      Load 100µl of the low and high controls into the same black nonbinding 96-well micro
